column4: Microsoft  BMW launch industrial cloud technology partnership
column5: FRANKFURT Microsoft Corp and BMW Group on Tuesday launched an initiative to create an Open Manufacturing Platform that seeks to stimulate innovation and accelerate the development of 'smart' factories.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft  BMW launch industrial cloud technology partnership
column5: * Microsoft-BMW alliance seeks 4-6 partners this year (Updates with details  Amazon-Volkswagen context)

column4: Microsoft and BMW launch open manufacturing platform
column5: FRANKFURT  April 2 Microsoft Corp and BMW Group on Tuesday launched an initiative to create an Open Manufacturing Platform that seeks to stimulate industrial innovation and speed the development of connected 'smart' factories.

column4: 'Impossible' meatless patty gets Burger King Whopper test
column5: Vegetarian burgers may finally be getting the recognition they need to go mainstream. On Monday Burger King and Silicon Valley startup Impossible Foods announced the rollout of the Impossible Whopper in 59 stores in and around St. Louis  Missouri. | Video

column4: Qualcomm finance chief departs for rival Intel
column5: Qualcomm Inc's chief financial officer  George Davis  has left the company to become finance chief at rival Intel Corp  the two companies said on Tuesday.

column4: UPDATE 3-Qualcomm finance chief departs for rival Intel
column5: April 2 Qualcomm Inc's chief financial officer  George Davis  has left the company to become finance chief at rival Intel Corp  the two companies said on Tuesday.

column4: Qualcomm finance chief to depart  likely for rival Intel
column5: April 2 Qualcomm Inc's Chief Financial Officer George Davis plans to depart the company and is likely heading to rival Intel Corp  according to Qualcomm and a person familiar with the matter.
